data.title: RCP Investments
data.text:
Key Personnel

A firm’s success is dependent on the people involved. Our personnel share an unyielding commitment to helping clients and colleagues achieve successful outcomes. The boutique nature of our firm allows us to provide individual attention at a time when many companies are focused on selling to the masses. We want to get to know you and learn how we can assist your financial future.

Terry Boone

Executive Vice President

Mr. Boone began his career with the Investment Division of First National Bank in Dallas, specializing in tax-exempt and government securities. He also worked for Underwood Neuhaus and Goldman Sachs. He began investing in RCP offerings in 1994, before joining the firm in 2004.

Tracy Ready

Executive Director of Capital Markets

Tracy Ready has served as RCP’s Director of Business Development since 2019, overseeing the firm’s program to secure new investors and financial partners. Ms. Ready previously worked at LegacyTexas, where she was a Top Producer and recipient of the bank’s coveted Rising Star Award. During her four-year tenure there, Ms. Ready brought in roughly $150 million in new accounts and loans.

Phone: 469-533-4019

Email: tready@rcpinvestments.com

James Magnum

Vice President of Acquisitions

Mr. Mangum manages the acquisitions, underwriting and asset management functions of the firm. He joined RCP in 2022 while earning his MBA from SMU’s Cox School of Business. Prior to joining RCP, he worked in investment sales for eight years and closed over $200 million in transactions for his clients. Mr. Mangum is a current MBA graduate student at SMU’s Cox School of Business. He graduated from SMU’s Meadows School with his undergrad degree in Corporate Communications and Public Affairs.

Phone: 469-533-4003

Email: jmangum@rcpinestments.com

Meredith Embree

Investor Relations & Marketing Associate

Ms. Embree is responsible for managing the administrative functions for the firm’s corporate office and is the lead administrative point person of our investor community. Additionally, she assists in the development and implementation of marketing strategies. Meredith joined us as a recent graduate of Southern Methodist University, Cox School of Business where she was awarded Distinguished Entrepreneurship Student of 2021. She also attended the London School of Economics & Political Science.

Phone: 469-533-4016

Email: membree@rcpinvestments.com

Steven D. Saxon

Member of the Boardd

Mr. Saxon specializes in land investment and development opportunities. He has worked in real estate for over 27 years conducting due diligence, performing pre-development services and negotiating the purchase and sale of commercial land. Mr. Saxon has worked with Realty Capital Partners since 2009 originally overseeing the real estate department, he now is a partner on the investment committee reviewing new investment opportunities.

Phone: 469-533-4000

Peter Aberg

Member of the Board

Mr. Aberg is an investment committee member at Realty Capital Partners. He is also a partner of Legacy Capital, a Company based in Dallas, Texas. Mr. Aberg began his real estate career at Henry S. Miller Company in 1983, where he became a top land and investment sales producer. He later spent 3 years with Bank One in the early 1990’s in the bank’s REO group and disposed of over $100 million of real estate.

Phone: 469-533-4000

Maison Vasek

Chief Financial Officer

Maison is a founding partner of Bodwell Vasek Wells DeSimone LLP, BVWD, a full service, registered CPA firm offering audit, tax, and consulting services. Prior to founding BVWD, Maison founded HMBL Consulting, and served as Chief Financial Officer of two middle-market companies over a four year period. Prior to the CFO suite, Maison spent eight years in public accounting with a Big 4 accounting firm and a Top 50 national accounting firm focused on audits of public and private companies. Maison serves on the Finance Committee of the Ronald McDonald House of Dallas. Maison graduated from the University of Oklahoma with BS degrees in Finance and Accounting and earned his CPA in 2007. He lives in East Dallas with his wife, and two daughters. Maison is a proud member of Munger Place Church and leads the fundraising team for the annual Munger Christmas Store.

Phone: 817-454-5175
